overview: Don Cramer, the Chief Information Officer at Tagwhat, is a seasoned hand at web development fluent in a multitude of languages including Php, Mysql, HTML, XML, JavaScript, AJAX, and JAVA. He is also accomplished in professional graphics development, web graphical development, GUI construction, interactive web applications, and Windows programming application development in C++ and C#. Don spent over a decade as a senior developer and consultant with a number of companies focusing on server deployment and security, specialty coding projects and other data oriented roles. Don is based in Columbus, Ohio.
